     #include <iostream>
    #include <cstdio>
    #include <string>
    #include<string.h>
    using namespace std;
    int lps[4000000] = {0};
    char pat[4000000];
    void computeLPSArray(string pat,int M)
    {
    int len = 0;
    int i;
    lps[0] = 0;
    i = 1;
    while(i < M)
    {
    if(pat[i] == pat[len])
    {
    len++;
    lps[i] = len;
    i++;
    }
    else // (pat[i] != pat[len])
    {
    if( len != 0 )
    {
    len = lps[len-1];
    }
    else // if (len == 0)
    {
    lps[i] = 0;
    i++;
    }
    }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<M;i++)
    printf("%d ",lps[i]);
    }
    int main()
    {
    int l1,l2,len;
    while(1){
    scanf("%s",pat);
    if(pat[0]=='E')
    break;
    computeLPSArray(pat,strlen(pat));
    printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
    }
